overview_of_class:
Are you a leader or do you want to enhance your leadership, management and communication skills? Introduction to Stage Management identifies and examines the stage management process. As part of this course, you will stage manage or assistant stage manage a Wirtz production for a professional director or professional MFA directors in the making. You will also be mentored during the entire production process by alumni, professional stage mangers and the instructor. You may stage manage or assistant stage manage during the quarter that you are enrolled in the course or the quarter following the course. This course is open to every NU student and it is the first course in the Theatre Management Module.

For more information and instructors consent, please contact Barbara Butts at b-butts@northwestern.edu
name: Introduction to Stage Management
title: SoC THEATRE 249-1-20 Introduction to Stage Management
